ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: No I said in Beta it was NOT Paladin Only but I was told by a GM that it was intended to be paladin only and was going to be for the final release. Was always
ygData.messageBody:
No I said in Beta it was NOT Paladin Only but I was told by a GM that it was intended to be paladin only and was going to be for the final release. Was always intend as paladin only just wasn't that way in beta. Guess we will have to wait till someone finds it to know for sure. I have not been able to get verification that it even remains in the game
----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Wooldirdge
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 4:23 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger


In beta the Fiery Avenger was not Paladin only I do not know where you heard this.
